name: Tracked Loader
description: Discover the multifunctional Tracked Loader!Thanks for your review. We're glad to hear your grandson enjoyed the set, even if he was a little worried about unnumbered bags!While many of our sets have numbered bags, not all do. Sometimes they're unnumbered to add a bit of a challenge. Or sometimes 2-in-1 sets will be unnumbered because the two build options won't have the same sorting. (Check out the b-model instructions for this set at LEGO.comTechnic!)
